definition: to pledge one's life
oath/vow/to swear/to pledge
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
to vow to die rather than obey (idiom)
to vow to fight to the death

sentences.english: Who decides why we live and why we die to defend.
sentences.chinese: 誰決定了我們生存的理由和誓死捍衛之事？

sentences.english: Tong Lin let yuan ren can not to television to the public the identity of the brother and sister.
sentences.chinese: 彤琳讓元仁誓死不得向電視臺公開兄妹的身份。

sentences.english: Los Blancos should support the coach and his players to death.
sentences.chinese: 白衣軍團應當誓死捍衛他們的球員和教練。

sentences.english: The Chinese dare to die such as return of spirit perhaps you haven't accepted?
sentences.chinese: 中國人誓死如歸的精神也許你們還沒領教過吧？

sentences.english: Hiro: Those are the 90 angry ronin , sworn to protect it.
sentences.chinese: 是誓死保衛它的90名憤怒的浪人。

sentences.english: I do not agree with what you say, but I swear to defend the right to speak you.
sentences.chinese: 不同意你說的每一個字，但願誓死捍衛你說話的權利。

sentences.english: I dont like Zheteng, but i will defend to the death your right to Zheteng.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡折騰，但我願意誓死捍衛你折騰的權利。

sentences.english: Though I disagree with you, I defy death to defend your right of speaking.
sentences.chinese: 我雖然不同意你的觀點，但我誓死捍衛你說話的權力。

sentences.english: They were determined to defend the land to the last drop of their blood.
sentences.chinese: 他們決心誓死保衛這塊土地，直到流盡最後一滴血。

sentences.english: When it comes to competitors, Gou fiercely guards his turf.
sentences.chinese: 當談到競爭對手時，郭臺銘誓死捍衛自己的領地。

definition: to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
fight to the death/desperate struggle
to risk one's life
rather die than submit (idiom)
to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
to meet death
to brave it out/to the bitter end
oath/vow/to swear/to pledge
to vow to fight to the death
to hold on firmly/to cling (to a belief)/stubbornly
to give one's body for the nation (idiom); to spend one's whole life in the service of the country
to be determined
Better broken jade than intact tile./Death is preferable to dishonor. (idiom)
pinyin: ning4 wei2 yu4 sui4 , bu4 wei2 wa3 quan2

definition: dauntless/to summon up courage and determination/using extreme force of will
bravery with no thought of personal safety (idiom); risking life and limb/undaunted by perils
to risk one's life
